## PollingConfiguration.AMOUNT\_OF\_POLLS property

The expected amount of HTTP polling attempts to be performed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
AMOUNT_OF_POLLS: number;
```

## Remarks

TEMP\_FREQUENCY \* AMOUNT\_OF\_POLLS = the total polling time/duration
